meanings.definition: The belief in a supreme being who created the universe but does not intervene in its affairs.
meanings.sent1: Many people find comfort in deisms, believing in a higher power that set everything in motion.

meanings.sent5: In the quiet of the night, the idea of deisms can feel both reassuring and mysterious.
